column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Appetizers: We got the truffle mac and cheese and the bacon. The truffle mac was loaded with truffle flavor
column3: and had a perfectly crispy top to it. It was decadent with just fantastic flavoring and presentation. Then the bacon. If you've had the burger at Au Cheval and added bacon
column5: but better. It was very thick with crispy edges
column8: yet retained the delicious saltiness of the meat itself. Then they sprinkle coarse black pepper grounds on it for an added kick. Just incredible.
